txt.en: The forces of Angmar rally near the Sorceress of Cowardice!
The North Bulwark is about to be attacked!
'Huzzah! The day is ours!'
The Sorceress of Despair has regained her strength!
The Sorceress of Doubt has weakened and is vulnerable to attack!
A Warlord of Angmar is attacking the North Bulwark!
Faelbenn's Bulwark is about to be attacked!

'We must hurry, [placeholder]! The Angmarim reinforcements are trying to cross the Rammas Deluon and are rallying near the various stones. Unfortunately we dare not cross the line of the stones, as there are foul Sorceresses supplicating the stones, making them more deadly than we have ever seen.

'However, it is not all dark. The sorceresses cannot maintain their state for very long and their resolve will falter. At those moments, you must strike and defeat those sorceresses!

'Do not forget though, if we are to maintain our blockade of the Rammas Deluon, our bulwarks must stand, so you must aid in their defence as well.'
'This was perhaps the greatest blow we have yet dealt to Angmar! It shows that they have become weakened, and it may soon be time for us to deal a final blow to them.'
'There is no more for us to do here...let us leave.'
The Sorceress of Doubt has regained her strength!
Defeated Angmarim sorceresses ([placeholder]/5)
Time expired
The South Bulwark is about to be attacked!
A bulwark has fallen
Faelbenn has been defeated

'Angmar will move against us soon.'
The forces of Angmar rally near the Sorceress of Despair!
'My strength... is returning....'
The Sorceress of Pain has weakened and is vulnerable to attack!
'You must be ready to strike at the Sorceresses when their resolve weakens.'
'My power returns....'
'But remember, our bulwarks must not fall, or else all will be lost!'
The Sorceress of Terror has regained her strength!

'Angmarim! Protect me....'
The forces of Angmar rally near the Sorceress of Pain!
Victory is yours... you should speak again with Faelbenn at once.
'I must... give life to the stones....'
'I am... in need of aid!'

'Come Angmarim! Stop them!'
